Class NewScenarioActionDelegate

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.ui.IActionDelegate, org.eclipse.ui.IViewActionDelegate
public class NewScenarioActionDelegate
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.ui.IViewActionDelegate

Action handler for editing a scenario. Open scenario dialog box.

Author:
Paulo Merson

init

public void init(org.eclipse.ui.IViewPart view)
This is called by the platform. Because this is an action handler for view actions, this method is the way the platform tells the action handler which view called it.

Specified by:
init in interface org.eclipse.ui.IViewActionDelegate
Parameters:
view - communicates takes the view from where the action was invoked as the param
